alert.note: Alert for Inland Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 7:02PM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST MONDAY FOR LAKE MOULTRIE... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, south winds 10 to 15 knots with gusts up to 25 knots. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Inland Berkeley County. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, until 3 AM EST Monday. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
